duties_responsibilities.duty: Create an exciting visual environment in the store and support all visual initiatives.
Merchandise the floor, create window displays, and change apparel on mannequins according to visual standards.
Execute promotional and sale set-up including presentation, lettering, and signage on the sales floor.
Assist in replenishing merchandise on the selling floor and in wall units.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 2 years visual team experience in a major multi-level department store, possessing a portfolio of previously created projects.
